caption: Inside a room with red curtains, the sunlight filtered in, casting a reddish hue over everything. One woman sat on a chair, wearing an unhappy expression. Beside her, a man was attempting to console her. He moved around her, speaking words of comfort. Eventually, the woman broke into a smile, and it seemed her mood improved.In another room, two men were having a meal together. The larger man was verbally insulting and belittling the smaller one. In response, the smaller man called over some people and had the obese man apprehended because his threats continued to escalate. However, it appeared to have no effect, and the obese man was dragged away in despair. The one who apprehended him came over to converse with the troublemaker.
